wallet.title: Wallet Management
wallet.noAccountsWarning: No withdrawal addresses yet, please add a withdrawal address first
wallet.loadWalletFailedRetry: Failed to load wallet information, please try again
wallet.loadChangesFailedRetry: Failed to load transaction history, please try again
wallet.loadWithdrawsFailedRetry: Failed to load withdrawal records, please try again
wallet.withdrawDescription: Please enter withdrawal amount and select withdrawal account
wallet.noWithdrawAccounts: No withdrawal accounts yet, please add one first
wallet.withdrawRemarkPlaceholder: Optional, explain purpose of withdrawal or other remarks
wallet.withdrawFeeNotice: Withdrawal fees will be deducted from the withdrawal amount, actual received amount subject to blockchain transfer
wallet.withdrawSubmitFailed: Withdrawal request failed, please try again
wallet.confirmDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete this withdrawal account?
wallet.changesDescription: View all income, withdrawal, and refund records
wallet.withdrawsDescription: Manage and track all withdrawal application statuses
wallet.accountsDescription: Configure withdrawal account addresses and network settings
wallet.accountSecurityDescription: Please ensure withdrawal address is accurate. Once submitted, funds cannot be recovered. Test with small amount first.
wallet.noAccountsDescription: Add your first withdrawal account to start managing your funds.
wallet.addAccountDescription: Select withdrawal method and enter payment information, supports cryptocurrency wallets and PayPal.
wallet.paypalGuide: Please enter your PayPal account email. Withdrawals will be sent to your PayPal account in USD. PayPal fees approximately 3%.
wallet.currencyGuide: USDT and USDC are both stablecoins pegged 1:1 to USD. If you're unsure which to choose, USDT is recommended as it's the most widely used stablecoin.
